unnormalised: Boss man is saying "perform or perish" but forgot to give us increments, lol. Guess I'll just start quoting Section 11A of the Industrial Disputes Act, 1947 during team meetings.
normalised: Boss man is saying "perform or perish" but forgot to give us increments, laugh out loud. Guess I'll just start quoting Section eleven A of the Industrial Disputes Act, one thousand nine hundred and forty seven during team meetings.
